casebody.data:
Noemi ESCOBAR, Individually and as Guardian for J.V., an Infant, Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
David A. MAZIE and Mazie Slater Katz & Freeman, LLC, Defendants-Movants,
v.
Jose Betances, Third-Party Defendant. M-532 September Term 2018
082070 Supreme Court of New Jersey. FEBRUARY 8, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal is granted and the matter is summarily remanded to the Superior Court, Appellate Division to consider on the merits. Jurisdiction is not retained.
